name: Birds Don't Exist
description:
This game was made in 1 week for the brackeys game jam 2022.1.

i whish i could tell you what its about but honestly i dont even know, birds i guess.

Controlls:

WASD to move

space to jump

hold space while in the air to hover kinda

CREDIT

envirement art: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/polygon-city-low-pol...

music: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/colossal-game-music...

the rest was made by me

(i know the UI is scuffed. it is 6:30AM at the time of me writing this and i have been fighting Unity WebGL for 3 hours now so im not going to fix it.)
